body.name: 14 Inch Full Size Platform Bed Frames with Wooden Slats, Black 3500 Lbs Heavy Duty Metal Bed Frame with Anti-Collision Round Legs, No Box Spring Needed, Easy Assembly
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 14 hrs 51 mins
features: [Sturdy and Quiet] The full size bed frame with wooden slats is strong and durable.This full bed frame can support up to 3500 lbs and providing a stable and noiseless.

[Easy Assembly] The full size bed frame metal is a simple combination structure, and all the necessary hardware and tools are well packaged in the box, This full size platform bed frame can be quickly assembled by one person.
[Storage Space] The bed full size frame has under-bed storage with a 11.5 inch vertical clearance under the full platform bed frame providing valuable storage space.

[No Box Spring Needed] The full size metal bed frame has dependable wooden slats which provide optimal support for your memory foam or latex mattress. This bed frame full size no box spring needed and is compatible with any standard size mattress.

[Warranty & Service] This black full bed frame comes with a 5-year product warranty and 24-hour online service to ensure your satisfaction. If you have any questions about this metal bed frame or assembly, please feel free to contact us.

ROUNDED DESIGN - The platform bed frame size is designed with rounded corners to prevent injuries caused by toe bumps.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: i got this for a guest room to replace a futon i’d had for 15yrs. this full sized bed was actually easy for one person with moderate experience putting furniture together. it probably took me 90 mins. the underbed storage is excellent and to my amazement it is incredibly solid and *truly* squeak free. it shares many traits with the bed in my bedroom which i believe was 7-8x the cost. if you want.a solid bed for you or guests that is very minimalist in style, and that stays on budget, this is the one

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing bed frame
reviews.reviewText: After reading all the reviews I went ahead and purchased this bed frame. I am more than impressed. Very sturdy, makes no noise, and has a simplistic style that I was looking for. It arrived on time and was super easy to assemble. I was looking for a frame that did not include the headboard as I have a customer made headboard that I wanted to keep. This bed frame hit all the marks and I am happy I found this and made the purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love the height. Ultra sturdy. My mattress fits perfectly on it. I've only had it a month now but I can tell this will last me for years. The slats do seem a little flimsy at first, but have no issues with their strength so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Plan to add plywood or trim straps support
reviews.reviewText: Was simple enough to put together with 2 people. It's stable & sturdy. Greatly expands the underbed storing capacity.The mattress doesnt slip around any more on this than any other frame or boxspring. (Just use some anti-slip grip liner if it's a problem)An occasional tightening every so many months might be a good idea for 225+lb folks... especially if anyone tends to toss/turn.Boards being on velcro straps is nice.***BUT***Though the support boards are strong , they're made of a flexible wood that bows with just enough give to create dips on each side & creates a hard ridge down the middle support beam. Plywood or 1× trimming strips cut to fit are a fix for this. We half expected this due to other reviews. Even with the work/added expense, was still a good value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The frame came adequately packaged. Instructions were pretty straightforward. And didn’t take too long to assemble. The Alen key that came with the hardware was a little short, and hard to use. I ended up using a ball end Alen key that I had that made it much easier. There is not an adequate way of attaching a headboard to this frame, I will have to drill a couple of holes in the frame in order to accomplish that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Believe All of the Good Reviews!
reviews.reviewText: We were so impressed with this bed that we also ordered a queen-sized bed. Metal bed frames can be squeaky and wobbly, but not this one! The construction is heavy-weight and solid. I'm a restless sleeper and this bed doesn't move or make noise when I move. I LOVE the rounded legs. They are knee savers! I also like the fact that the 2 extra legs are attached to the middle support and not along the edges. Saves toes and makes the space more accessible for storage tubs. My husband was able to put the bed together quickly and without any issues. He was impressed with how well it is made. It IS tall, but I wanted the underbed height for storage tubs. I'm 5'3" and, with our 9" thick mattress, the bed hits me at the top of my thighs. I'm 72 and have no problem getting up on the bed, but if your pets sleep with you, they may need steps. If you are looking for a bed with storage, I would highly recommend this one!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome height bed that will allow plastic storage bins under it
reviews.reviewText: This bed allows for bins under it for extra storage that I needed. No center posts... so great for storage with no posts in the way. I paired it with a 18" bedskirt and is great. I recommend this bed. If you want to attach a headboard, then no holes for that, but I knew that. I think it is important to note that on this bed the slats are closer together than other beds and makes it very sturdy for the mattress. I am very happy with this purchase. I also ordered the queen bed in this frame and very pleased as well. It is a little pricey for just a frame, but I needed it , so went ahead and ordered.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Flimsy wooden slats 🤷🏼‍♀️
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I really wanted to like this bc it’s aesthetically pleasing, but the wooden slats are so flimsy. I am 5’9” and 190 rn. The center beam is so ridged that it’s impossible to sleep on it so I found myself on either edge. Also there’s a giant gap between the slats that adds to this areas of weakness. Bad design.
